basicInfo.name: Kyle
basicInfo.flavor: Having taken on a mission from an unknown individual, Kyle begins to track the Night Crows.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Does 1 additional attack(s) that deal(s) damage equal to 130% of Physical Attack upon using a basic attack 2 time(s).
 - Single Enemy (Eyes of the Strong)
 - 30% chance to grant 1 Buff Removal(s) upon doing an additional attack.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Chain Suppression
Skill 1.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Physical Attack plus 8% of the target's Max HP 2 time(s). (Damage increases by up to 50%, proportional to the target's lost HP) (HP-based damage limited to 75% of caster's Attack)
 - Single Enemy (Eyes of the Strong)
 - Deals additional damage equal to 65% of Physical Attack
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 72% of Physical Attack plus 10% of the target's Max HP.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Skill 2.name: Chain Burial
Skill 2.desc:
4 Enemies
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 70% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Single Enemy (Eyes of the Strong)
 - Deals additional damage equal to 65% of Physical Attack
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Ignore Defense

Passive.name: Master of Chains
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Starting battles with at least 3 Attack hero(es) on your team grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
 - Starting battles with at least 3 Attack hero(es) on your team grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 4 Hit(s)]
 - Enemy with the Highest Attack
 - Grants Eyes of the Strong. [Always Active]
 - All Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 23% of the target's Max HP 1 time(s) upon using any attack 2 time(s). (HP-based damage limited to 100% of caster's Attack.)
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Stacks: All Damage Nullification ends after taking 4 hit(s).
 - Increases Damage: To 32% of the target's Max HP.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Grants All Damage Nullification when HP falls to 70% or lower. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)] [Once per Battle] (If deployed to a team with 3 or more Attack heroes)

Passive (Trans).name: Master of Chains
Passive (Trans).desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 130% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Teo, the strong, all sorts of alcohol, strength, stimulation, excitement, various weapons
profile.dislikes: Teo, white rice, the weak, boredom, hand-to-hand combat
profile.story: Having taken on a mission from an unknown individual, Kyle begins to track the Night Crows.

basicInfo.name: Kyle
basicInfo.flavor: Kyle attempted to assassinate Teo, but after three days of non-stop fighting and inflicting serious injuries to each other, they halted the fight. Kyle gave Teo the cut on his cheek.

Normal Attack.desc:

 - 30% chance to grant 1 Buff Removal(s) upon doing an additional attack.

basicInfo.name: Kyle
basicInfo.flavor: Kyle's origins are not known. He successfully killed Shadow Clan's leader, Deathbringer, earning him a reputation as the greatest assassin.
